#include  <bits/stdc++.h>
#define   ll   long long int
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    ll t;
    cin>>t;
    
    while(t--)
    {
         ll n;
         cin>>n;ll res=1;
         while(n--){
         ll x;
         cin>>x;
         res*=x;
         res%=1000000007;}
         cout<<res<<endl;
    }
}
